title: Mission Workshop carries it w/ new Speedwell VX pack & pocketed Mission Pro Shorts
content:
Aimed at the outdoor and adventure crowd, but looking very appropriate for bikepacking and all-day mountain bike rides, the new Mission Workshop Speedwell VX adds a few new pockets to whatâ€™s already one of our favorite packs.
